name: Dominoes: Classic Board Game. Play it for Free!
name_original: Dominoes: Classic Board Game. Play it for Free!
description:
Enjoy yourself with one of the most widely played boardgames in the world: Dominoes! Set up tables and play with your friends; try to defeat your opponent using strategy, reasoning and a dash of luck.

In Dominoes, you can choose between 4 game modes: Classic, All Fives, Block or Turbo. In Turbo mode, can you invite your Facebook friends and play with them! You can also play alone, or face other people online in multiplayer mode.

Gather your tiles and doubles and win enough points to ensure your victory. Download it now for free!

Features:
- Call your friends to play Dominoes with you and set up tables with them
- Play with your friends, alone or against other people in online multiplayer
- 4 Dominoes modes: Classic, All Fives, Block or Turbo
- 3 difficulty levels
- Games with 2 or 4 players, against AI players or people in online multiplayer
- Customization options: choose your favourite tile style, table type and the dominoes animation speed

If you like classic boardgames like Mahjong, Backgammon and Checkers, you will love this game. Download Dominoes now and enjoy!
